citation.article-title: Description of Idiomarina insulisalsae sp. nov., isolated from the soil of a sea salt evaporation pond, proposal to transfer the species of the genus Pseudidiomarina to the genus Idiomarina and emended description of the genus Idiomarina

p.s: Description of Idiomarina salinarum comb. nov.
Idiomarina salinarum (sa.li.na’rum). L. gen. plu. n. salinarum of salt-works).
Basonyms: Idiomarina salinarum Yoon et al. [28], Pseudidiomarina salinarum comb. nov., Jean et al. [10].
The description is identical to that given for Idiomarina salinarum by Yoon et al. [28].
The type strain, ISL-52T (=KCTC 12871T =CCUG 54359T) was isolated from a marine solar saltern of the Yellow Sea, Korea.
